write on my raverly s profile raincrochetplus i used dk weight acrylic yarn in many different colors but you can choose the kind of dk yarn you like most you can change colors in every round or use just one color there aren t rules i ve used 105 gr - 315 meters 344 yards it s ok to use a worsted yarn too materials 4 5 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure stitch markers pattern is written in us crochet terms 10 cm x 10 cm/ 4 x 4 = 8 row chain 18 gauge row 1 double_crochet in the second chain from hook double_crochet 17 st row 2 chain 2 turn double_crochet until the end of the row 17 st row 3-8 repeat row 2 until you ll have 8 row 17 st the side of each square measures 15cm 6 1 granny balaclava evolution pattern by ra in crochet chain chain bpdc back post double_crochet abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch/stitches *----* repeat instructions from *to* as many times as stated rs right side ws wrong side this balaclava fits an adult but you can make any other sizes using smaller granny sizing squares the final width is approx 27cm 10 5 the final length is approx 34cm 13 5 this pattern is customizable and you can add extra length or width as you like try this project with another version of granny square you can find many example tips on magazines books and online
